price: 25. iska jirana fidmo aan ugu dhaceyn si gaar ah kuwiinna idinka mid ah ee dulmiga fala6; oo ogaada in Alle uu Daran yahay Ciqaabkiisu.
arabic: وَٱتَّقُواْ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّا تُصِيبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنكُمۡ خَآصَّةٗۖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
footnotes: 6. Tani waa digniin in ciqaabta ay mar walba sababteed tahay ku caasinta Alle iyo Rasuulkiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittaqū fit'natan lā tuṣībanna alladhīna ẓalamū minkum khāṣṣatan wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
